class.name: YThreaderInterrupter
class.brief_description: A utility class for managing thread interruption.
class.description: YThreaderInterrupter provides functionality to safely interrupt and cancel threaded operations. It helps manage the lifecycle of threaded tasks and ensures clean cancellation.

method.name: cancel
method.description: Cancels the current operation and signals threads to stop.

method.name: is_cancelled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the operation has been cancelled.
